post:
**MERRY CHRISTMAS and HAPPY HOLIDAYS :)**


So I had a previous post that I was going to try and edit, however I cannot.

I have a few more spare IPs and a lot more disk space for some more free VMs.

If you'd like one, please PM me your resource plan and what you plan to do with it.

The server will not be over allocated, and I will not tolerate any kind of illegal activity. Being that this is a service I am offering at no charge, be aware that I will terminate your VM if I even have a suspicion of illegal activity (SPAM included).

I provide no warranty on this service and simply offer it to people looking for a VM for dev or learning or games.

**This offer is open to Canadian and US residents only.**

Test IP: 162.248.208.98
Location: Atlanta GA (QuickPacket)
